name: Lowyat Forum Dark
description: Coloring scheme borrowed from XDA Dark theme
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://forum.lowyat.net/"),url-prefix("https://forum.lowyat.net/"){html,body,#userlinks,#userlinksguest,#submenu,#submenu a:link,#submenu a:visited,.newslink td,.newslink span,.newslink input,.tablepad,.calmonths,.calday,div.lcnb_news_inner{Background:#111!important;color:#eee!important}.textarea{color:#aaa!important}article.lcnb_news.lcnb_type_rss{border:1px solid #555!important;box-shadow:1px 1px 0 #555!important}a:link{color:#ddd!important}#ads_bottom_leaderboard2{display:none}a:visited,a:active,table,tr,.subtitle a:link,.button{background:transparent!important;color:#ddd!important}p,.row1,.row2,.forumdesc,.forumdesc a:link,.forumdesc a:visited,.forumdesc a:active,.borderwrap h3,.maintitle,.maintitlecollapse,table th,.borderwrap table th,.subtitle,.subtitlediv,.postlinksbar,.catend,.toplinks span,.formtable td.formtitle,.formsubtitle,#gfooter td,.pagelink,.pagelinklast,.pagecurrent,.minipagelink,.minipagelinklast,.darkrow1,input,textarea,select,td{background:#212121!important;color:#bbb}.pagecurrent{background:#55c!important;color:#ddd}#navstrip a:link,#navstrip a:visited,.borderwrap table th a:link,.desc{color:#999!important}.background,.borderwrap,.borderwrapm{background:#333!important}.quotetop{background:#444!important;color:inherit!important}.quotemain{background:#223030!important;color:#aaa!important}.borderwrap p.formbuttonrow,.borderwrap p.formbuttonrow1,.bar,.barb,.barc,#starred_tabs LI A,SPAN.member-tagged{background:#555!important}#starred_tabs LI A:hover,#starred_tabs LI A.selected{background-color:#55c!important}td.formbuttonrow{border:1px solid #555!important}#replies_to_me{background:rgba(64,64,92,.85)!important;color:#aaa!important}.borderwrap h4{background:#aaa!important;color:#234!important}.errorwrap h4,#pmnotewrap h4{background:#543535!important;color:#aaa!important}#ucpmenu,#ucpcontent,.gsc-modal-background-image{background:transparent!important}.gsc-results-wrapper-overlay{background:rgba(92,92,92,.8)!important}.gs-webResult.gs-result a.gs-title:link,.gs-webResult.gs-result a.gs-title:link b,.gs-imageResult a.gs-title:link,.gs-imageResult a.gs-title:link b{Background:#111!important;color:#eee!important}.gs-webResult div.gs-visibleUrl,.gs-imageResult div.gs-visibleUrl{color:#bbb!important}.gs-webResult .gs-snippet,.gs-imageResult .gs-snippet,.gs-fileFormatType{color:#ccc!important}table th,.borderwrap table th,.subtitle,.subtitlediv,.postlinksbar,.borderwrap h3,.maintitle,.maintitlecollapse{border-bottom:#bbb!important;border:none}.newslink{Background:#111!important;color:#eee!important;border:1px solid #eee}.bar,.barb,.barc{border:1px solid #aaa!important}.quotemain,.quotetop{border-left:4px solid #aba!important}.pagelink,.pagelinklast,.pagecurrent,.minipagelink,.minipagelinklast,.textarea,.searchinput,.button,.gobutton{border:1px solid #aac!important}.signature{color:#666!important}#topic_replies{background:rgba(64,64,92,.85)!important;color:#eee!important}.spoilertop{background:#223030!important;color:#aaa}.spoilermain{background:#302230!important;color:#abb}.searchinput{color:#eee!important}td.pformleft img,td.pformright img,td.post2.post_td_left img,td.post1.post_td_left img,td.post2.post_td_right img,td.post1.post_td_right img,div#ucpcontent img.avatar,div#ucpcontent div.signature img,.gs-web-image-box img.gs-image,div#topic_content.borderwrap img.avatar,div#topic_content.borderwrap div.borderwrap img,div.borderwrap td.row2 div.signature img,div.borderwrap img.avatar,div#forum_topic_list.borderwrap td.row1 img{filter:none;-webkit-filter:none}div#fo_stat.borderwrap td.row1 img,td.nopad img,td.formbuttonrow.post_td_left img,td.formbuttonrow.post_td_right img,p img,table.newslink img,table.newslink input.button,div.borderwrap td.row2 img,div.borderwrapm td.row1 img,div.borderwrap input.gobutton,div#ucpcontent img,div.activeusers img,td.formbuttonrow img,table.borderwrap img{filter:invert(75%);-webkit-filter:invert(75%)}td.formbuttonrow,.ruleswrap{background:#000!important}.postdate{color:#ddd!important}.postwrapper,.ipbnav,#ipbcontent{border:1px solid #555}.posttopbar{background:#072A66!important}.ipbnavsmall{border:1px dotted #555}}
